description: Ultra abilities are unlocked with the 4th evolution, which need a total of 1,000 babies. Each troop evolved to Ultra gives 300 additional Portal Energy.

archer-queen.name: Archer Queen
archer-queen.details: X-Bow shoots 3 arrows every single time. These arrows are slightly angled, so when individual enemies are far away only one arrow will usually reach the target.

barbarian.name: Barbarian
barbarian.description: Gets Enraged after busting a foe
barbarian.details: During the 7 seconds after busting an enemy, Barbarian gets around 35% more Hit Speed. It doesn't affect other troops of your squad.

barbarian-king.name: Barbarian King
barbarian-king.details: Similar to the normal Rage spell, Super Rage makes troops deal more damage while maintaining the Hit Speed.

battle-healer.name: Battle Healer
battle-healer.description: Heals much more after opening a Chest
battle-healer.details: The amount of HP healed almost doubles.

bea.name: Bea
bea.details: With 38% more speed, Ultra bees seem quite dangerous.

bo.name: Bo
bo.description: Mine deals much more damage to Monsters

chicken.name: Chicken
chicken.description: Spawns Hatchlings much faster while using Turbo

colt.name: Colt
colt.description: Bullet Storm charges when attacking Monsters
colt.details: Probably one of the best Ultra abilities, causing the Bullet Storm to activate after any 4 targets are hit, instead of 4 busts. It even counts hitting several targets within the same attack as separate hits, so you can potentially activate the Bullet Storm in less than 4 attacks.

dynamike.name: Dynamike
dynamike.details: With 25% more DPS, Dynamike combines the best parts of all his previous abilities: big damage, 2 sticks and big radius.

el-primo.name: El Primo
el-primo.description: Heals a lot after Flying Elbow Drop

goblin.name: Goblin
goblin.details: The total coins for a fusion increase very slightly:

greg.name: Greg
greg.details: Both the normal and Fusion drop a single heart.

hog-rider.name: Hog Rider
hog-rider.description: Turbo increases movement speed even more
hog-rider.details: Turbo Speed increases by "27". Hard to say if this refers to 27% or something else, more testing is needed to know.

mavis.name: Mavis
mavis.description: Get more bonus loot from Carrot patches
mavis.details: The rewards for single carrots doesn't change, but loot when you complete a patch increases significantly.

max.name: Max
max.details: The Ultra ability increases both the base duration of the Speed Boost and the recharge per busted enemy.

medic.name: Medic
medic.details: Medic has 2 different heal effects: passive heal and Heal Packs. Passive heal targets all the troops of your squad, and Heal Packs. Heal Packs heal much more, but are only given to one troop, the one with the least proportional HP.

mortis.name: Mortis
mortis.details: Now you can get 2 bats for each busted NPC: one straight away, and another when the revived NPC dies.

nita.name: Nita
nita.description: Resummons her Bear twice as fast
nita.details: The Classic ability resummons Bruce (the bear) after 40 seconds after it's busted. The Ultra ability reduces that time to just 20 seconds.

pam.name: Pam
pam.description: Heal Station has more powerful healing
pam.details: Heal Per Second (HPS) increases by 28%, and the final wave heals 25% more.

penny.name: Penny
penny.details: You get around 25% more Coins and Gems, so 2 more of each on average.

royale-king.name: Royale King
royale-king.details: Elite Recruits have 48% more DPS and 33% more HP than Royal Recruits.

shelly.name: Shelly
shelly.details: Super Shells double in damage, from 200 to 400. The amount of projectiles also increases, from 15 to 25.

tank-girl.name: Tank Girl
tank-girl.details: When in Overdrive, Tank heals 200 HP every 1.5 seconds (133 HPS). As a Fusion, she heals 500 HP instead (333 HPS). This is one of the best troops in the game, and this healing ability makes her even more versatile and well-rounded.

trader.name: Trader
trader.description: Heals much more when giving Gems
trader.details: Heals your squad 75% more after collecting 15 coins.

witch.name: Witch
witch.description: Skeletons get stronger bones and a sharp dagger
witch.details: Elite Skeletons have double the DPS, and 56% more HP, which is still not much.

wizard.name: Wizard
wizard.details: This applies to Bosses and Big Monsters
